title: Carousel
description: Changing slides with images and text.

samples.name: default
samples.text:
Northern Lights

Also known as aurora borealis, they illuminate the sky.

Tundra

Tundra is a type of biome where tree growth is hindered by frigid temperatures and short growing seasons.

Blue Flowers

Clusters of blue flowers with vivid colors.

attributes-text.name: time
attributes-text.description: Time in seconds for each slide, defaults to 10.

attributes-text.name: label
attributes-text.description: Accessible name for the whole carousel. Defaults to "Highlighted Content".

attributes-text.name: height
attributes-text.description: CSS height for the carousel images. Defaults to 500px.

attributes.name: playing
attributes.description: If the carousel should autoplay on load.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Make the component expand to full width even inside a container

attributes.name: overlay
attributes.description: Move the text content to be over the image on wider viewports

css-variables.name: --ilw-carousel--font
css-variables.description: Font for the carousel text content [default: var(--il-font-sans)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-carousel--background
css-variables.description: Background behind text content below the carousel [default: #fff]

css-variables.name: --ilw-carousel--control--background
css-variables.description: Background of the controls area [default: var(--il-storm-95)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-carousel--prevnext--border-width
css-variables.description: Border width of the previous/next buttons [default: 2px]

css-variables.name: --ilw-carousel--prevnext--line-height
css-variables.description: Line height of the previous/next buttons  [default: 1]

css-variables.name: --ilw-carousel--prevnext--font-size
css-variables.description: Font size of the previous/next buttons  [default: 1rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--font
css-variables.description: Font for the slide headings [default: 700 2rem/1.3 var(--il-font-sans)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--paragraph-font
css-variables.description: Font for the slide paragraphs [default: 500 1.125rem/1.5 var(--il-font-sans)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--overlay--text-color
css-variables.description: Color for the slide content when overlay is used [default: #fff]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--content-width
css-variables.description: Max width for the slide content area [default: 500px]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--content-extra-padding
css-variables.description: Extra padding to add to the top of the content area to allow for controls [default: 1.125rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--compact--content-extra-padding
css-variables.description: Extra padding to add to the top of the content area to allow for controls when in compact mode [default: 1rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--overlay--padding
css-variables.description: Padding for the slide content area when overlay is used [default: 1.5rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--overlay--left
css-variables.description: Left position for the slide content area when overlay is used [default: 8vw]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--overlay--font
css-variables.description: Font for the slide headings when overlay is used [default: 700 2.25rem/1 var(--il-font-sans)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--overlay--background
css-variables.description: Background for the slide overlay [default: radial-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.94), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35))]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--shadow-color
css-variables.description: Shadow color for the slide headings when overlay is used [default: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-slide--overlay--paragraph-font
css-variables.description: Font for the slide paragraphs when overlay is used [default: 500 1.25rem/1.5 var(--il-font-sans)]
